main.name: Hey! I'm Martino Manzolini
main.bio: I was born in Como in 1998. I always combined non-teaching interests, like digital art, 3D modelling and video rendering, with Computer Engineering studies.
main.bio2: I focused my studies on Advanced User Interfaces, and more generally, on the Front-end development of applications, both for academic and extracurricular projects.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in my work and you'd like to discuss future collaborations, feel free to leave a message in the form below.
